formattedAddress: 410 St Nicholas Ave, New York, NY 10027, USA
adrFormatAddress: 410 St Nicholas Ave, New York, NY 10027-7614, USA

originalText.text: I have lived at 410 St Nicholas Ave for 28 years. This building is at it worst plenty drug activity. No security, elevator never works 29 floors 3 elevators go figure, about 10 washing machine. Management and maintenance are only here to collect a check. PLENTY OF PEOPLE ON ALL KIND OF SUBSIDY. Very few working people. Homeless sleeps in stairway, constantly people smoking in hallway. Supervisor came to unstop my tub and made it worst 3 days later and I still can not take a shower. Call MS Rivera several times (property manager) I left not on 11-16 and 11-17 at 5am on my way to work spoke with property manager at 350 pm who stated that Nelson the supposedly maintenance supervisor said they went to mr house ( a lie ) tub still clogged haven’t showered in 3 days going to hotel and won’t  to be reimburse!! By all means don’t move here you will quickly move out trust me.  Please see pic below  good location not safe

originalText.text:
There are 29 floors and for the past 4 days only one elevator is running.  Management sent a notice saying it will be 3 weeks before it is able to be corrected.  The average elevator wait is 60- 75 minutes.  Totally unacceptable.  The fire department has been called out a few times.  Not sure why.  But there are elderly in the building that could die because they are not able to receive emergency assistance.

This totally unacceptable
